title: Horror Game Music Loops
description: A collection of music for creating a dark, scary and creepy atmosphere with a total duration of over 01 hours, containing 15 music themes and 45 audio files.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/horror-game-music-loops

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/4w4cgrjek9ks5zy/MSE%20-%20Horror%20Game%20Music%20Loops_v1.0.pdf?dl=0


The package contains 15 music themes in a single 70bpm tempo.


Each musical theme is represented by three audio files, where the first is just atmosphere, the second is a musical seamless loop without atmosphere, and the third is a looped mix of musical loop and atmosphere. The duration of each music sample is 1 minute 22 seconds.


Use musical themes as ready-made compositions for disturbing, creepy and spooky gameplay or battle scenes, background menus, trailer music, animations or videos.


You can also divide all completed compositions into bars or beats, and to create ever-changing music and extra variation, you can start your beat from a new place each time. Don't be afraid to experiment.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 15 music themes
  • 30 music loops
  • 15 audio files with atmosphere
  • 45 audio samples total
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • all tracks in 70bpm
  • great for scary and creepy atmosphere
  • perfect for RPGs, Fighting, Adventure, Horror, Survival, Fantasy and other game genres


Number of Audio Wavs: 45

Number of Audio Cues: 45

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 01 hour 01 minutes 30 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
